title: [Medicine] Immuno-suppressants may negatively affect SARS-CoV-2 antibody responses. In a study on autoimmune inflammatory rheumatic disease (AIRD) patients, neutralizing antibody levels were significantly lower for AIRD patient than in controls. Arthritis treatments were risk factors for reduced responses

[Epidemiology] Previous natural infection (NI) was associated with an overall lower incidence of COVID infection than mRNA primary-series vaccination. 11405 total infections were recorded in the vaccine cohorts while 5884 total reinfections were recorded in the NI cohorts. Severe COVID was low in both groups.
